## Slide
```{r, message=F, fig.cap= "Source: mtcars"}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
theme_set(theme_classic())

g = ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg))
g = g + geom_density(aes(fill=factor(cyl)), alpha=0.8) + 
    labs(title="Density plot", 
         subtitle="Miles per gallon(MPG)",
         x="MPG")
ggplotly(g)
```
